title: My Portfolio
description: Here's a small hint of what I have done already!

projects.title: Intranet Boticario
projects.description: Intranet developed for Boticário group. I created the pages in psd, then in HTML and implemented in Sharepoint 2010.

projects.title: Chame o Chef
projects.description: I created an ecommerce for chef de cuisine. U can schedule a meal, and they go to your home. All based on the region and availability of chefs' hours. The client schedules and pays directly for the site. Logo creation, mockup, and implementation in PHP / Wordpress.

projects.title: Compara Câmbio
projects.description: Personal project. Creation of an aggregator of exchange houses, with a comparison of currencies, rates and values, based on users region. Developed in PHP/Slim, Mysql and AngularJs.

projects.title: Corra Melhor
projects.description: Ebook Sale Project and training for beginners in street running, with a blog on the subject. Developed in PHP / Wordpress

projects.title: Fatuche Burguer
projects.description: Hotsite for the restaurant Fatuche Burger. I did the psd, html, and after integrated in AngularJs. Developed in PHP, Mysql and AngularJs.

projects.title: Intranet FIEP
projects.description: Development of the Intranet of the Federação das Indústrias do Estado do Paraná. I did the PSD, HTML mockup, and subsequently implemented in Sharepoint 2010.

projects.title: Flor do Dia - Floricultura
projects.description: Development of the floriculture website Flor do Dia, for the agency Pulpa do Design. Developed in PHP/Wordpress and Mysql.

projects.title: GRC
projects.description: Development of a HelpDesk solution - FrontEnd, to be integrated in the GLPI Project, by REST. Developed in PHP/Slim, Mysql e AngularJs.

projects.title: HBSIS - GCAD
projects.description: Creation and Development of a mobile application for contract control for the HBSIS company. Developed in HTML/CSS3.

projects.title: Hotsite Webcenter Portal
projects.description: Creation of the Oracle Webcenter Portal product hotsite, with product information and technical specifications, for the sales team. Developed in HTML.

projects.title: Ibema
projects.description: Creation and development of the Ibema website. Developed in PHP/Mysql.

projects.title: IDM 365
projects.description: Creation of a hotsite for the IDM 365 product, with technical information for the sales area. Developed in HTML.

projects.title: Illimitati
projects.description: Website for the company illimitati, with descriptive about the company, products and services. I created the website in PSD, after a mockup and then developed in Wordpress. Developed in PHP/Wordpress.

projects.title: Intranet IT7
projects.description: Intranet for IT7 company. Using ADF and Oracle Webcenter Portal and javascript. Developed in Java, ADF e JS.

projects.title: Intranet Illimitati
projects.description: Demonstrative intranet for the illimitati company, using Liferay 6.2 technology. Developed in Java, SCSS, JS, LDAP.

projects.title: IPC
projects.description: Website for the Instituto Paranaense de Cegos (IPC). It was developed as a partnership with the institute, so it was tested directly for the blind and low vision public, in order to demonstrate that accessible sites can also be aesthetically pleasing. Developed in PHP/Wordpress.

projects.title: Lilica e Tigor
projects.description: Website developed for the season promotion Lilica & Tigor, for the Agência Combo client. Developed in PHP, Mysql e JS.

projects.title: Loja Marceneiro
projects.description: Ecommerce developed for the company Loja Marceneiro. I developed the PSD, after a HTML mockup and later integrated to the wordpress, using eccommerce tools to integrate with payment. Developed in PHP/Wordpress e JS.

projects.title: Moradas Clássicas Tingui
projects.description: Hotsite for a property launch. Static site only with product images. Developed in HTML e JS.

projects.title: Piui Abacaxi
projects.description: Institutional site of the children's clothing store Piui Abacaxi. Creation of design, mockup in HTML and later developed in Wordpress. Developed in PHP/Wordpress e Js.

projects.title: Positivo EBS
projects.description: Creation of template for Oracle E-Business Suite, for Positivo company. Developed in HTML e JS

projects.title: Quero Praticar
projects.description: Personal project to add activities to a map, integrated to google places. Showing the location of activities by user region. Developed in HTML, PHP e AngularJs.

projects.title: Renner
projects.description: Creation and development of template for Renner client. Developed in HTML e AngularJs.

projects.title: Palladium Office
projects.description: Creation of Hotsite for the client Diego Rossetto. Real estate ad page of the Palladium Office. Developed in HTML e JS.

projects.title: Stelo
projects.description: Creation of checkout pages for the Stelo customer. Developed in HTML e JS.

projects.title: Corporate TV
projects.description: Corporate channel for television. Based on the company's intranet, content is extracted via the REST and consumed by JS. Developed in Java, ADF e AngularJs.

projects.title: Intranet Uninter
projects.description: Creation of the Uninter intranet. Developed in HTML and Js, later implemented in Sharepoint 2010.

projects.title: Vitrines Off
projects.description: Ecommerce design based on user location. Logo creation, design and development. Partner stores register their products via the front-end and make available on the site. User only sees the products of your city or region. Developed in PHP/Wordpress.
